summary: Implements the third routine antenatal care visit for pregnant women, delivering scheduled interventions, adapting care to gestational age, and arranging follow‑up appointments or inpatient admission when complications occur.
business_intent: Provide the appropriate third ANC services around 26 weeks gestation, ensure delivery of gestational‑age specific interventions, and coordinate subsequent care pathways including the next ANC contact or admission to an antenatal ward.
